alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:01AM CDT until April 01 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL TIPPAH...NORTHERN ALCORN...SOUTHEASTERN HARDEMAN AND MCNAIRY COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Selmer to Pocahontas, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Adamsville, Glen, Pocahontas, Theo, Farmington, Walnut, Bethel Springs, Middleton, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Hornsby, Stantonville, Rose Creek, Pebble Hill and Strickland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
